concept.title: Video Settings
concept.shortdesc: Overall, most settings will be fairly self-explanatory.

conbody.p: The following settings are available to fine tune your output.

ul.li: This is the amount of space you have to fit your sources. You usually want this to match your monitor display resolution, or if you are playing games, the game resolution. Default is your primary monitor.

conbody.p: Output (Scaled) Resolution should be the Stream Output Resolution (720p, 480p, etc)

ul.li: This is the resolution that the stream/recording will output at, using the selected downscale filter.

conbody.p: Common FPS Value should match your desired output FPS (30/60 for example)

ul.li: Note that 60-fps streaming can be very taxing on your system compared to 30-fps. Test ahead of time and ensure your system has enough resources available.
